onboard_sub_title1: The best online store you will ever find!
onboard_title2: Have an app made just for you
onboard_sub_title2: Here at Snap, you have several options for shopping, where one of these options could even be yours!
onboard_sub_title3: Create your profile and start making your purchases or sales; the Snap app is entirely made for and by our users.
promotion_content1: We are an online store specialized in selling various products. We offer a wide variety of items, from electronics and furniture to clothing and accessories. With guaranteed quality and competitive prices, we have what you're looking for. Take advantage of our promotions and make your purchases with complete convenience!
promotion_content2: At our store, we offer free shipping on all orders, with no minimum purchase amount. We deliver nationwide with speed and security. Take advantage of this exclusive advantage and make your purchases worry-free!
promotion_content3: Enjoy our winter sale with unbeatable discounts! Buy jackets, boots, blankets, and much more at incredible prices. Stay warm and stylish this winter with our special offers!
name_invalid: Name must be at least 3 characters long
email_invalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address
password_invalid: Invalid password. Minimum 8 characters: 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 special character
social_name_invalid: Social name must have at least 3 letters
age_requirement: You need to be of legal age
bio_invalid: Bio must have at least 10 letters
cpf_invalid: Please enter a valid CPF (format: XXX.XXX.XXX-XX)
error_saving_user: An error occurred while saving the user
error_saving_product: An error occurred while saving the product
too_many_attemps: Access temporarily blocked. Please try again later
user_disabled: The user account has been disabled.
authentication_error: An error occurred during the authentication process!
description_invalid: Description must have at least 10 letters
info_message_no_product: You haven't added any products yet!
info_message_no_order: You haven't made any purchases yet!
error_message_no_cep: Unable to find a zip code in your account
remove_item_from_cart: Do you want to remove the item from the cart?
error_getting_cep_data: An error occurred while retrieving the ZIP code data
